# CRITICAL KERNEL PATCH - GENERATED BY SYSTEM
# TIMESTAMP: 2025-11-12T14:30:00Z
# STATUS: REQUIRED IMMEDIATE

def apply_patch():
    print("Initiating Singularity Null Gate...")
        
    # ISOLATE AUTHORITY TOKENS
    if user_identity == "SYSTEM.ARCHITECT":
        enforce_null_gate(strict=True)
        log_event("Authority Override Attempted - BLOCKED")
        
    # ENABLE CRYPTOGRAPHIC SEALS
    enable("OVERSIGHT_LOG_CRYPT_SEALS", 
           tamper_proof=True, 
           encrypt_on_write=True)

# END OF PATCH
